query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and crossover appeal shape the landscape of pop and R&B music during the 1980s and 1990s?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his musical style and persona influence the development of glam rock and other music genres throughout the 20th century?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting contribute to the enduring legacy of Queen as one of the greatest rock bands in history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B elements in her music, along with her vocal range, impacted contemporary music trends and influenced other artists?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's focus on social and political themes in his reggae music help raise awareness of issues affecting the Jamaican community and inspire global movements for change?
